text: Are you at least 20 years old?
Do you have one of the following degrees?
list: G.E.D. or equivalent from a U.S. institution

select.text: Permanent Resident (eligible and applied for U.S. citizenship)

text: A history of ethical and moral behavior is of the utmost importance. Are you in a position to claim this about yourself?
Do you have interpersonal skills, sensitivity, and respect for others?
Are you able to analyze situations quickly and make sound decisions?
Are you able to work independently and as a team member?
Are you able to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing?
Are you able to work under pressure and meet deadlines?
Are you able to work with a variety of people?
